item.title: Neal St Monmouth St, 8th August
item.description:
Missing bollard/lamppost/left only sign here. This is very dangerous as yesterday I was waiting to cross here, and a car approaching along Neal Street actually turned right (illegal) onto Monmouth St and cut the corner, nearly running over my feet!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 80, Neal Street, Bloomsbury, London

item.title: Un-bagged dog excrement around several trees in Byne Road, 8th August
item.description:
Dog owners are not cleaning their dog excrement. Several trees and the pavements are being used as dog toilets and its the same people every day. The street needs to be cleaned, signage erected and enforcement for the few bad dog owners.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Byne Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abondoned car, 8th August
item.description:
The car has been in front of our property for about two months now without moving. It appears to have been in a collision relatively recently.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Narford Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Buckley Court - in front of the first side gate of 1-6 Buckley court, 8th August
item.description:
2 large human poos which are stinking and attracting flies. There’s also a stench of dried urine too. It needs a deep clean, it is very unhygienic and children live in the area.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Buckley Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
